system.requirements: Adept, Arbitrator, Cleric, Guardsman, or Psyker Career, DH Rank 4+. Possess Literacy Skill, can only take rank if offered it by an Inquisitor.

description.value:
Those entrusted with a fraction of the power of an Inquisitor, even strictly limited, have a terrifying authority to command local law enforcement, and detention and requisition as they need. They bear a document stating the locale and focus of their investigations, and a coded Sigil of Inquiry as proof of inquisitorial backing.

Effects: Replace new Rank's Advances with that of the Legate Investigator
